name: Be A Lord
description:
VR Entertainment present first VR game:

Be a Lord

It`s game to relax after hard working day.

No long quests, saving or another boring stuffs.

Simple fantasy Game:

- 3 maps with a lot of enemies
- Runic Weapons (Sword, Axe, Staff)
- Realistics Enemies
- Some blood effects (helpful if your boss was annoying today)

Instruction

  • B - Staff Shoot
    A- Run
    Joystick Right - Rotate
    Joystick Left - Move
    Menu Button - Return / Exit Game
